summary:
DevOps Engineer experience with 3 years and possesses a Master of Computer Science. I work in a well-organized, team player, goal-oriented, quality-minded, self-directed, and punctual style. My experience and knowledge from training and projects are to automate the CI/CD pipeline for different environments, manage infrastructure as code using Terraform, build and deploy apps using Docker containerization, and monitor cloud infrastructure and apps using Nagios, ELK, Prometheus & Grafana. My vision is to be an expert in DevOps Engineering and become Cloud Solution Architect.

Key Highlights
- Liaising properly with external or internal stakeholders. 
- Solid understanding of software development life cycle. 
- Engage and work with management and development teams.
- Netherlands Nuffic & IDW Educational Credential Evaluation Certified in March-2020.
- Canada CIPS Associate of Information Technology Professional A.I.T.P Certified in May-2019.
- Canada CIPS British Columbia Member in June-2018.

projects.title: Su-Car App
projects.description:
One of the projects that I have involved in as DevOps Engineer was https://su-car.com/en/index.html. I started to work on this big project from July 2019 until now. The technologies used to develop this project were:
	1. Back-end: Java Spring Boot Framework using JHipster Generator. 
	2. Database: MySQL 
	3. Front-end Mobile App: React-Native
	4. Front-end Landing page: HTML5, CSS, Javascript

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities
1) Guided operation team [4 members] on how to use the Odoo system.
2) Assisted operation team to adjust/fix urgent sales/purchases issues.
3) Designed testing scenarios to check app functionality.
4) Conducted Mobile App testing for Android and iOS.  
5) Generated a testing result report for developers.
6) Prepared a list of issues using Jira and Project module in Odoo system. 
7) Follow up with mobile developers to solve and fix the reported issues.
8) Used Digital Ocean to provision 24Dokan Odoo server.
9) Monitored Odoo server to check its CPU & Storage health.
10) Coordinate with Odoo implementer to customize/fix reported issues.    
11) Reported work progress to stakeholders on weekly basis.

Achievements
01) Participated to launch 24Dokan 
02) Assisted operation and sales team on how to use Odoo system. 
03) Managed to fix the reported bugs with mobile developers.
04) Assisted to improve the mobile app by providing suggestions to stakeholders.
profile_positions.title: IT Support Engineer - Remote

profile_positions.description:
As a newcomer to the Netherlands, passionate and enthusiastic to work in a Dutch working environment especially in the tech industry which is my passionate profession, I have started my new life chapter in the Netherlands by working as a Shopper at Picnic Technologies the Europe's fastest growing online supermarket. 
As a shopper in Diemen FC, my daily activities using the advanced Warehouse Management System WMS are :
01) Collecting groceries in the warehouse.
02) Loading and unloading the trucks.
03) Monitoring the quality of the products.
04) Replenishing the shelves in the warehouse.
profile_positions.title: Shopper

5) Conducted API testing and documentation using Postman tool.
6) Checked data availability & integrity in MySQL & MongoDB databases.

9) Used Jira and Trello for project planning and progress tracking.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Achievements

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities
1) Prepared system/application proposals to several clients.
2) Prepared service agreement to several clients.
3) Involved in business marketing and sales development.
4) Defined project requirements, costs, and milestones. 
5) Prepared UML diagrams for such system/application requirements.
6) Prepared dev environment [Code repositories, VM servers, configuration]. 
7) Prepared system/application documentation.
8) Performed system/application manual testing and quality assurance.
9) Managed a relationship with internal & external clients.
10) Supervised team & daily procedures of projects development.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Achievements

2) Structured organizational hierarchy & operational procedures.
3) Managed 11 web apps & 4 mobile app projects till May 2020.
4) Managed projects life cycle with 4 team members.
profile_positions.title: Assistant IT Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
1) Define and study business system & application requirements. 
2) Analyze and evaluate the gathered requirements using UML concepts. 
3) Propose and design alternative solutions using UML diagrams. 
4) Uses Rational Rose and Microsoft Visio to draw diagrams. 
5) Follow up & coordinate the implementation phase with programmers. 
6) Validate proposed design by testing phase by adopting varies testing levels from unit testing to system testing and user acceptance testing (UAT). 
7) Prepare the system features & user guide for developed system or application. 
8) Document the system development life cycle in a standard format. 
9) Participates in evaluation phase to keep monitoring the performance of developed system or application and to enhance any update or upgrade required to maintain the efficiency and effectivity.
10) Prepare system proposals to several clients
profile_positions.title: System Analyst

Achievements

2) Classified various items and products and reorganized the structure of the warehouse.
3) Updated business procedures.
Supervised junior accountant to key in financial records properly.
